title: Line Breaker: A Collection of Poems
description: "Line Breaker" is the debut poetry collection of artist and writer, Lila Marquez. It is about topics she's most passionate about such as social justice, immigration, nonhuman animals, labor issues and the environment. Lila Marquez is a Filipina writer and artist. She lived in Kuwait for over 15 years where her articles, columns, comic strips and illustrations have been published in Kuwaitâ€™s local newspapers and magazines from 2007 under the pseudonym, Armineonila M. Her literary writings and artworks have also appeared in literary anthologies, art publications and art exhibitions in Kuwait, the Philippines and abroad.
